title: Division by Zero Handling
description: Handle division by zero using try/except.
instructions: Run the code to see error handling for division by zero.
starter:
numerator = 10
denominator = 0
try:
    result = numerator / denominator
    print('Result:', result)
except ZeroDivisionError:
    print('Error: Cannot divide by zero.')

files./division_by_zero.py:
numerator = 10
denominator = 0
try:
    result = numerator / denominator
    print('Result:', result)
except ZeroDivisionError:
    print('Error: Cannot divide by zero.')
